subject: JUnit and ColdFusion MX

Hi all,

Has anyone ever used JUnit to unit test ColdFusion MX pages?  As of 
ColdFusion MX, CFML scripts are compiled into JSP which, of course, 
makes it a Java class.  If anyone has attempted this I'd like to hear 
how it was accomplished.

Thank you,
Darryl Staflund
